import React from "react" import Logo from "../../Logo/Logo" import NavigationItems from "../NavigationItems/NavigationItems" import Backdrop from "../../UI/Backdrop/Backdrop" import Aux from "../../../aux/aux" import Classes from "./SideDrawer.module.css" const SideDrawer = props => { let sideBarClasses = [Classes.SideDrawer, Classes.Close] if(props.sideBarState){ sideBarClasses = [Classes.SideDrawer, Classes.Open] } return(
) } export default SideDrawer
